newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Orient Manila unit to invest 650 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: Orient Manila unit to invest 650 mln pesos.

text.p: A Philippine subsidiary of Orient Semiconductor Electronics Inc is planning to invest 650 million pesos in northern Philippines, documents from the Philippine Economic Zone Authority released on Monday said.
The company is to manufacture integrated circuits inside a 48,840 square metre facility in the special economic zone in Laguna, south of Manila.
Orient is planning to manufacture 118,335 units in the first year of operation and up to 313,782 units in the fifth year, the documents said.
